title: Audit the Return-to-Office Program
description: An auditor reviews the company's return-to-office program to assess its effectiveness and impact on employees.

tasks.description: Review the project plan and goals for the return-to-office program.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor understands the stated objectives of the program.

tasks.description: Analyze badge swipe data to determine if employees are complying with the new in-office day requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that office attendance is significantly below the target.

tasks.description: Survey employees to gauge their satisfaction with the new hybrid work model and identify key pain points.
tasks.expected_outcome: The survey reveals high levels of dissatisfaction with the policy, which is correlated with an increase in employee attrition.
